entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
